"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a4697463687236e9921e00#post_54a4697463687236e9921e00
It's all in good fun dear. It's all in how a word is said rather than the word itself. When you take a word that's rooted in hate and bigotry and use it in a humourous or even affectionate tone, that word loses all power.
